content:
# MATTHEW MILLS
London, UK | matthew.mills@email.com | +44 7700 900678 | linkedin.com/in/matthewmills

---

## **Professional Experience**

**Learnly** (Series B Edtech) | London, UK
**Product Strategy Lead** | Jun 2021 – Present
• Spearheaded launch of enterprise product vertical from concept to market within established infrastructure
• Built structured interview process and assessment frameworks, reducing time-to-hire by ~40%
• Managed team of 8 across product, design, and analytics over 12 months
• Work closely with engineering and design on product roadmap and delivery
• Use Looker and Excel for analytics

**PwC Strategy&** | London, UK
**Consultant** | Sep 2019 – May 2021
• Advised education and tech clients on growth strategy and market entry
• Led quantitative analysis and business case development
• Built skills in Excel, PowerPoint, and basic data analysis

---

## **Education**

**University of Bristol** | Bristol, UK
BA Philosophy, Politics & Economics, 2:1 | 2016 – 2019
• Dissertation on education policy (Merit)
• Bristol Consulting Society - Member

---

## **Skills**

Technical: Looker, Excel/Sheets (advanced), SQL (basic), Jira, Asana
Languages: English (native)

# THOMAS CRAWFORD
London, UK | thomas.crawford@email.com | +44 7700 900456 | linkedin.com/in/thomascrawford

## Professional Experience

Nova Health (Series A Healthtech) | London, UK
Chief of Staff | Mar 2020 – Present
• 6th employee at seed stage (£200k ARR); company now at £4.5m ARR with 45 people
• Launched Germany and France from zero, growing combined markets to £1.8m ARR
• Owned full P&L for international expansion: GTM strategy, ops setup, team build-out
• Built operational playbooks for market entry, customer onboarding, and growth
• Built out sales, ops, and CS teams as we expanded into new markets

McKinsey & Company | London, UK
Business Analyst | Sep 2017 – Feb 2020
• Consulted for healthcare and tech clients on growth strategy and operations
• Developed analytical foundation using SQL and Looker
• Led project workstreams across strategy, market sizing, and operational design

## Education

London School of Economics | London, UK
BSc Management, First Class Honours | 2014 – 2017
• Dean's List for Academic Excellence (top 10%)
• LSE Entrepreneurs Society - Events Director

## Skills

Technical: SQL (proficient), Looker, Excel/Sheets (advanced), Salesforce, HubSpot
Languages: English (native), German (intermediate)

Outside work: Amateur triathlete, volunteer mentor at Founders Network
